nav.div: Yamhill Carlton School District » Departments » Safety/Security » Coronavirus Information Page » Covid-19 Updates

div.span: Below are links to resources for families from the federal, state and local authorities regarding the COVID-19 (coronavirus) that will assist you in understanding the virus, frequently asked questions, and printable fact sheets.

br.br:
- Oregon.gov COVID-19 Frequently Asked Questions
- COVID-19 Printable Fact Sheets Handouts Posters
- CDC Handwashing Fact Sheets
- COVID-19 CDC Frequently asked questions and answers (what is it, how does it spread, what are the symptoms, who is at risk, and prevention resources)
- CDC-COVID-19 and Children
- Talking to Children about COVID-19 (Coronavirus)
- When is my child too sick to send to school?
- OHA Novel Coronavirus Fact Sheet
- CDC travel notice: https://wwwnc.cdc.gov/travel/notices
- WHO page: https://www.who.int/westernpacific/emergencies/novel-coronavirus
